name: Bella Hadid
subtitle: Model and Palestinian-American activist
bio: Bella Hadid has been vocal about her Palestinian heritage and has consistently shown support for Palestinian rights. She has used her platform to raise awareness about the Palestinian cause.

name: Gigi Hadid
subtitle: Model and activist
bio: Gigi Hadid has joined her sister in supporting Palestinian rights and has donated to relief efforts.

name: Mark Ruffalo
subtitle: Actor and humanitarian
bio: Mark Ruffalo has been outspoken in calling for Palestinian human rights and has criticized military actions in Gaza.

name: Susan Sarandon
subtitle: Actress and activist
bio: Susan Sarandon has participated in pro-Palestinian demonstrations and has been a vocal critic of Israeli policies.

name: Roger Waters
subtitle: Pink Floyd co-founder and activist
bio: Roger Waters is a prominent supporter of the BDS movement and has been very vocal about Palestinian rights.
